title: Patient Care Practice Competency Enhancement: CIMO-Based Scholarship of Teaching and Learning (SoTL) Methodology Development Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: The educational context can be systematically analyzed using the CIMO logic model.
At least three research questions reflecting generative learning theory can be developed.
Verified teaching-learning improvement plans can be submitted through project-based assessment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
